overview: A steamy detective yarn about a sizzling female cop stalking a cold-blooded murderer, Trinity Brown takes us through the underworld of hot-blooded, super-sexed gangsters, strippers, pimps, call girls and cheap street hoods.  A notorious gangster has just been murdered. The case falls into the lap of Trinity Brown, a stunning redhead and no-nonsense female detective. While there is no love lost between her and the victim, Trinity performs her job like a pro and everyone in town feels the heat. Desperate for a solution, Trinity pulls out all the stops, and with the aid of her sexual charms, sets a trap for the killer.
title: Trinity Brown
